title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: NoneIntroduction to high performance computing, basic definitions: cluster, grid, meta-computing, middleware etc., examples of representative applications. Programming models: shared memory, message passing, peer-to-peer, broker-based. Introduction to PVM and MPI. Architecture of cluster-based systems. Issues in cluster design: performance, single-systemimage, fault tolerance, manageability, programmability, load balancing, security, storage. Architecture of Grid systems. Grid security infrastructure. Examples of Grids: Globus etc.
